医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
ASU研究人员提出了一个统一的解释，用于驱动阿尔茨海默氏病的分子混乱在一个开创性的理论中，亚利桑那州立大学生物设计学院的科学家提出了一个统一的解释，以解释驱动阿尔茨海默氏病的分子混乱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/asu-researchers-propose-a-a-unifying-forplanation-for-molecular-chaos-chaos-chaos-driving-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/asu-researchers-propose-propose-a-unifying--planation-for-molecular-chaos-chaos-chaos-driving-alzheimers-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6EE1FC32-73F1-4F02-9B35-D33222F1BFA0F Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:33:14 -0500 ASU researchers propose a unifying explanation for molecular chaos driving Alzheimer's disease
有关怀孕期间使用大麻的药房警告信号发现无效根据《罗格斯大学酒精和毒品研究杂志》的一份新报告，药房的警告信号可能没有有效的大麻使用妊娠中的潜在健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/dispensary-warning-signs-about-cannabis-us-cannabis-us-der-during-pregnancy-found-ineffective.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/dispensary-warning-signs-about-cannabis-use-dring-during-pregnancy-found-ineffection-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57ff6849-FDF7-4909-B04C-1E8B6D4C0A6D Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:28:30 -0500 Dispensary warning signs about cannabis use during pregnancy found ineffective
Mayo Clinic开发了AI工具来可视化复杂的生物学数据Mayo诊所的研究人员开创了一种称为OmicsFootprint的人工智能（AI）工具，该工具有助于将大量复杂的生物学数据转换为二维圆形图像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/mayo-clinic-develops-ai-tool-tool-to-tool-to-visalize-complex-biological-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/mayo-clinic-develops-ai-tool-tool-to-tool-to-visalize-complex-biological-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65DCE3BA-5A12-4B22-4B22-8C90-B4A5BF1CD0B8 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:24:15 -0500 Mayo Clinic develops AI tool to visualize complex biological data
肾上腺果蛋白激素有助于肥胖相关2型糖尿病的胰岛素耐药性一项新研究显示，激素肾上腺肾上腺素蛋白会破坏血管细胞中的胰岛素信号传导，从而导致肥胖相关2型糖尿病的全身性胰岛素抵抗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/adrenomedullin-hormone-contributes-to-insulin-onsulin-抑制in-obesity-in-obesity-spersity-samped-type-type-type-type-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/adrenomedullin-hormone-contributes-to-insulin-esulin-esistance-in-obesity-spociated-massity-samped-type-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b27c35d-0dce-4014-A341-941-9D64D70515B7 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:18:15 -0500 Adrenomedullin hormone contributes to insulin resistance in obesity-associated type 2 diabetes
儿童和成人创伤可能在子宫内膜异位发病机理中起作用巴塞罗那大学参加了一项国际研究，该研究发现了新的证据，将创伤经历和压力性事件与子宫内膜异位症联系起来，子宫内膜异位症是一种慢性全身性炎症性疾病，其特征是子宫外子宫内膜样组织的存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/childhood-and-and------------------may-play-a-play-a-role-in-endomertionsis-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/childhood-and-ychildhood-and-adult-trauma-may-play-a-play-a-role-in-in-endomertionsis-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4014fd69-83c8-4714-b0a1-a1cdaec6fa84 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:13:00 -0500 Childhood and adult trauma may play a role in endometriosis pathogenesis
学校外卖禁令只是政策幻想吗？学生说是大多数年轻人都不知道学校附近的外卖排除区，而限制新网点的政策无法解决便利店和送货应用程序的不健康食品通道。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/are-school-takeaway-bans-just-just-a-policy-policy-illusion-students-say-yes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/are-school-takeaway-bans-just-just-a-policy-policy-illusion-students-say-yes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77E14429-CB0C-4C91-A633-C1DCBA5E0CF4 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:11:00 -0500 Are school takeaway bans just a policy illusion? Students say yes
研究人员发现有助于克服本能恐惧的大脑机制UCL塞恩斯伯里惠康中心（SWC）的研究人员揭示了使动物能够克服本能恐惧的精确大脑机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/researchers-uncover-brain-mechanisms-th-help-overcome-overcome-instinctive-fears.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/researchers-uncover-brain-brain-mechanisms-th-help-overcome-instinctive-fears.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68C579A9-AE21-42FE-ADFC-C23E05F20DA6 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 21:07:06 -0500 Researchers uncover brain mechanisms that help overcome instinctive fears

类风湿关节炎和骨关节炎中RNA结合蛋白的失调宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。获得了来自已发布数据集的单细胞RNA测序（SCRNA-SEQ）数据，以研究RNA结合蛋白（RBP）的表达和失调，这对于类风湿关节炎中的替代mRNA剪接和转化对照至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/dysregulation-of-rna-binding-proteins-in-rheumatoid-arhumatoid-arthritis-and-sosteoarhthrohthiph.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/dysregulation-of-rna-binding-proteins-in-rheumatoid-theumatoid-alhumatoid-arthritis-and-sosteoarlthrisis asspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2EAB13D-76E2-41C4-9D70-1BC189EC3A56 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 20:52:07 -0500 Dysregulation of RNA-binding proteins in rheumatoid arthritis and osteoarthritis
